info.name: Honest Insurance - Postman API
info.description:
Detailed API endpoint documentation available at:
https://api.honestinsurance.net

request.description: Takes a transaction hash of a submitted Ethereum transaction and returns the transaction receipt after it has been mined
Returns the configured authorisation keys either for the bank or trust contract
Returns the configuration details for this hosting environment used
Deploys the 9 smart contracts required to form an insurance pool
Executes a pre-authorisation on the Trust or Bank contract
Adds a new authorisation key to the Trust or Bank contract
Rotates the authorisation keys of the Trust or Bank contract
Returns the constants that are being used within the insurance pool ecosystem
Returns the addresses of all the smart contracts that are deployed and form an insurance pool ecosystem
Returns the ecosystem's variables from all the contracts
Returns a list of ecosystem event logs matching the provided search criteria
Returns a list of timer notification events scheduled
Configures the Expensens of the insurance pool ecosystem for the current day
Sets the flag to account for a daylight saving change during the next overnight processing
Calls the timer contract to perform a ping calling all pending transactions to be executed
Returns the details for the requested Adjustor
Returns a list of adjustors in decending order
Returns a list of adjustor event logs matching the provided search criteria
Creates an adjustor within the specified pool ecosystem. Only the trust can create an adjustor
Updates an adjustor. Only the trust can update an adjustor's details
Retires an adjustor. Only the trust can perform this operation
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Creates a bond within the specified pool
Creates a bond within the specified pool
Creates a bond within the specified pool
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Returns a list of bonds in decending order
Returns a list of bond event logs matching the provided search criteria
Creates a bond within the specified pool ecosystem
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Creates a policy within the specified pool ecosystem. Only adjustors can perform this operation
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Returns the details for the requested Bond
Creates a bond within the specified pool
